articles.title: Beninese Preparatory Committee Formed
Presidium of Politburo of Benin Socialist Party-Baanitee Meets
articles.content:
Presidium of Politburo of Benin Socialist Party-Baanitee Meets 
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Presidium of the Politburo of the Benin Socialist Party-Baanitee was held in Cotonou on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 At the meeting Chairman of the party Ali Houdou highly praised Kim Jong Il for wisely leading the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence with his great Songun policy. He stressed the need to further strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with the Workers' Party of Korea which is invariably holding aloft the banner of socialism while shattering the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

Ten Best Taekwon-Do Players Selected
articles.content:
Ten Best Taekwon-Do Players Selected
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Taekwon-Do Committee has recently made public ten best Taekwon-Do players for Juche 94 (2005).
 They include People's Athletes Pu Song Min and Ro Song Hui, Merited Athlete Sa Ok Jin, master of sports Ri Chang Sik, People's Athlete Jang Kum Suk, Merited Athletes Kim Kum Chol and Ri Chol Rim, master of sports Pu Song Jin, Merited Athlete Ro Hyon Hwa and master of sports Pak Jin Myong.
 They distinguished themselves in pattern competitions, sparring matches and demonstration shows of the World Taekwon-Do Championships held in Australia in July last year and thus demonstrated the honor of Korea, the homeland of Taekwon-Do, once again and placed the first in standings of countries.

articles.title: Royal Blood-Fresh, Elixir of Life
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches' corps here on the occasion of his birthday.
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol who is minister of the People's Armed Forces Tuesday by Military Attache of the Cuban embassy Giraldo Abreu Morales who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Japanese
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Japanese
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting Japanese delegation for the study of the Juche idea on the occasion of his birthday.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Etsuko Shimada, secretary general of the Kanagawa, Japan, Prefectural Society for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Works who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Performances Given by Art Groups of Ministries and National Institutions
articles.content:
Performances Given by Art Groups of Ministries and National Institutions
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Art groups of ministries and national institutions gave performances at the Ponghwa Art Theater and the Central Workers' Hall on Monday to celebrate February 16.
 The performances were appreciated by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Yong Mu, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Kuk Thae, Vice-Premiers of the Cabinet Ro Tu Chol and Jon Sung Hun, Chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, Chairperson of the C.C., the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party Ryu Mi Yong and others.
 Colorful numbers carrying reverence for leader Kim Jong Il were put on the stage by officials of ministries and national institutions who have dynamically conducted mass art activities and contributed to keeping in full bloom the revolutionary soldier culture of the Songun era in the whole society.    
 Among them were chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Il,"  mixed duet and chorus "February Is Spring," chorus "Fly over Clouds to Dear General," female chorus "We Will Hold Father  Kim Jong Il in Higher Esteem," male chorus "We Will Go to End of the World," female solo "Single Mind" and chorus "Song of Everlasting Hearts."
 The performances were acclaimed by the audience for their high ideological and artistic value.

articles.title: 15th Festival of Loyalty of Youth and Children Opens
Gift to Kim Jong Il from C.C., Workers' Party of Belgium
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from C.C., Workers' Party of Belgium
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Belgium.
 It was handed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday by Baudouin Deckers, general secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Belgium, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Talks between Secretary of C.C., WPK and General Secretary of C.C., WPB
articles.content:
Talks between Secretary of C.C., WPK and General Secretary of C.C., WPB
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Talks between Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Baudouin Deckers, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Belgium, were held in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
 At the talks both sides informed each other of the activities of their parties and exchanged views on the issue of further expanding the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and a series of matters of mutual concern.
 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.
